The eight thousand nights of reincarnation have finally been rewarded... Thank you, girl from the future. The curse placed on Mei-sama has finally been lifted...
Miss Kurokaede! Miss Shirosakura! Hold on, I will save you!
黑枫！白樱！坚持住！在下一定会救你们的！
黒楓殿！白桜殿！持ちこたえよ！妾が必ず助け出すぞ！
흑풍님! 백앵님! 버티세요! 제가 꼭 구해내겠소!
Lady Kurokaede! Lady Shirosakura! Hold on! I will definitely rescue you!
...It's no use. We have died the second we sealed the curse. What you see now is nothing but a waft of our remaining souls.
……在封印诅咒的那一刻，妾身与妹妹就已经死去了，现在大人所见的只不过是一缕残念罢了。
……呪いを封印したその刹那に、妾と妹はとうに死んでおるのです…今ご覧になっておられるのは思念の残像に過ぎません…
……저주를 봉인한 그 순간, 저와 동생은 이미 죽어있었소… 지금 보고 계신 것은 사념의 잔영에 불과하오…
...The moment the curse was sealed, my sister and I were already dead... What you see now is nothing more than an afterimage...
We have stayed long enough. It is time to say goodbye.
已经相处了这么久了，也是时候该告别了。
長いお付き合いでしたが、お暇する時が参りました…
오랜 시간 함께 했지만, 이제 헤어질 때가 왔군요…
We've been friends for a long time, but the time has come to say goodbye... (TN: When good old friends are going away~ Will you wish them to remember your name?~)
Long is the night, the red moon shines bright.
暗く長い夜はどこも赤い月。
어둡고 긴 밤은 어디나 붉은 달이더라.
Mirrors and glass flowers, like shattered dreams through the hours.
鏡花も琉璃も、あの世の夢と散る。
In slumber for a thousand years we remain, and in our next life we'll meet again...
Ow! Hey, we're back in Nagazora, aren't we?
うわああ！！え……ここは…長空市…？
Aaahh!! Eh... isn't this... Nagazora City...?
Seems like we have returned the moment Kurokaede and Shirosakura disappeared.
看来黑枫和白樱消失的瞬间我们也回来了呢……
どうやら黒楓さんと白桜さんが消えた瞬間に私たちも戻ってきたみたいね…
흑풍 양과 백앵 양이 사라진 순간 우리도 돌아온 모양이네…
It seems that the moment Kurokaede-san and Shirosakura-san disappeared, we returned...
And what happened to that warrior lady?
あの侍は？どうなったの！？
And that samurai? What happened to her?!
There doesn't seem to be a grave here anymore. Perhaps she found the true meaning of her life.
这里的墓已经不在了……我想一定是找到她自己生命的意义了吧。
ここにあったお墓が無くなっているわね…と言うことは、きっと自分の命の意味を見つけたんじゃないかしら？
여기 있던 무덤이 사라졌네… 그 말은, 분명 자신의 삶의 의미를 찾은 게 아닐까?
The grave that used to be here is gone now... does this mean she has found the meaning of her life?
